ついにメルゴダの深淵の空に、黒竜自らがこの世界
を滅ぼすためにくぐり抜ける渦が現れた

　もはやレスタニアで動ける騎士と覚者は一握りとな
った今、黒剣の発見には、クラウスがいちはやく亡都
メルゴダに目星をつけ、錬金術師たちの中心となり動
いてくれた

　亡都メルゴダで錬金術師たちの協力のもとに黒剣を
全て破壊した我が覚者は、最後の滅びの渦へ渡るた
め、メルゴダ護政区にあるメルゴダの深淵へと向かっ
た

　メルゴダの深淵の淵に開いた、滅びの渦へのゲート
の前でミシアルが現れ、黒竜を倒すことが世界を滅び
から救う唯一の道だと告げたと言う

　滅びの渦の中では、レオが我が覚者を待ち受けてい
た。レオは、黒竜を倒し得る唯一無二の存在となるた
めにすべてを、そう、自らをも犠牲にして動いていた
ようだ。世界を救える存在は、自身、または我が白竜
の覚者のいずれなのかを問うたのだ

　レオは、世界の命運を賭けて我が覚者と果し合いを
し、すべての力と未来を託して消え去ったという

　かくて黒竜の元へ辿り着いた我が覚者は、竜の理の
破壊を目論む黒竜を討ち破り、そして誰もが想像だに
しなかった新たな理のかたち、人と竜が等しく生きる
時代が幕を上げた

　この物語の続きは、次なる神官であり、錬金術師で
もある愛すべき我が不逞の弟子、クラウスに託すとし
よう

　白竜の神官長ジョゼフ、ここに記す
new:
Finally, in the sky above the Mergoda Abyss, the black dragon itself appeared, bringing with it a vortex to destroy this world.

Now that only a handful of knights and Arisen remain in Lestania, Klaus quickly identified the location of the Black Sword, Mysial, in the capital city of Mergoda, and rallied the alchemists to assist.

With the cooperation of the alchemists in the Mergoda Ruins, our Arisen, who had destroyed all the Black Swords, set off towards the Mergoda Abyss in the Mergoda Security District to cross into the final vortex of destruction.

At the gate to the vortex of destruction, Mysial appeared and proclaimed that defeating the black dragon is the only way to save the world from ruin.

Within the vortex of destruction, Leo awaited our Arisen. It seemed that Leo had sacrificed everything, even himself, to become the one and only being capable of defeating the black dragon. He questioned whether the savior of the world would be himself or our white dragon's Arisen.

Leo engaged in a final battle with our Arisen, staking the fate of the world. He entrusted all his power and the future to our Arisen before disappearing.

And so, our Arisen who reached the black dragon, planning to destroy the order of the dragons, finally defeated it. 
And thus, a new era, one where humans and dragons live equally, unfolded, something no one had ever imagined.

The continuation of this story will be entrusted to Klaus, the next priest, and also, the lovable disciple of our rogue ways, an alchemist.

Joseph, the High Priest of the White Dragon, writes it here.
